name: Plunger Pilot
description:
A DMSPIL2019 48 hours Jam-Game CONTROLS

Mouse click - Lower plunger, UI interaction
Mouse click and hold - Control Paddle

GAME INFO

By using harmless plungers, innocently snatch up the individuals with ideals harmful to the climate to make the world a better place :)

JAM INFO

Used themes are; "Death is good" and "Unexpected Mechanics"

Developed to function as a mobile game :)
